snippet: GIBBONS--Marthe, 86, of Scotch Plains, NJ, died January 8, 2016. Wife of the late Edward J. Gibbons, she spent her working career at Colgate Palmolive and Exxon Research. Mass will be at Immaculate Heart of Mary R.C. Church, Scotch Plains, on January 30th at 11am. For additional information or to sign the guestbook, visit www. fanwoodmemorial.com. 1/3
